explanation:
code_hardening: none
resolve_compilation_errors: Renamed the method to execSuCommand while preserving the static modifier, return type, and varargs signature; ensured calls to readFully(InputStream) and Closer.closeSilently(Object...) match existing project methods.
exception_handling: Preserved the original try/catch structure for IOException and InterruptedException without adding or removing handling logic.
logic_customization: Added a side effect to print the fully captured command output to standard output using System.out.println(res) immediately after reading it, without changing control flow or the returned value.
refactoring: Renamed the method from sudoForResult to execSuCommand as required, with no other structural or behavioral refactoring.
misc: none
